name: Pathology
description: Biochemistry, Immunology, Serology, Microbiology, Clinical Pathology, Histopathology, Molecular Laboratory

name: Radiology & Imaging

name: Health Package
description: We have different health packages. Monthly package, Yearly package, Family package, Old Package, child package.

name: Home Service
description: We provide home service. Our man will collect necessary sample from your home. After diagnostic our man will home delivery your report.

name: Pharmacy
description: We provide all kinds of life saving medicine, which are available in Supernova. Our aim is to provide good medicine and best service quality to the patients.

name: Ambulance
description: We provide emergency ambulance service. This service is 24/7. All life saving emergency equipments are available in ambulance.
